T

From: Thomas Donnelly [mailto:tsd@johansonberenson.com]

Conversation: Trademark Infringement re: 7flooringsecrets.com
Subject: Trademark Infringement re: 7flooringsecrets.com


Dear Ms. Almeida:

Attached please find correspondence regarding the above-referenced
matter.  I thank you, in advance, for your professional assistance in
the prompt resolution of this matter.

Respectfully,

Thomas S. Donnelly, Esq.
Johanson Berenson LLP
1400 N. 14th Street
Arlington, Virginia 22209
(703) 387-3020 (Telephone)
(703) 991-8119 (Telefax Transmittals)
tsd@johansonberenson.com





This is a communication per the Electronic Communications

Privacy Act and may contain confidential and privileged

material. Disclosure is limited to the intended recipient and

review or distribution by others is prohibited.  Receipt by

other than the intended recipient does not constitute a loss of

the confidential nature of the communication.  Any attachments

are legal documents and should not be altered without approval

of legal counsel.  Due to software variations, documents printed

at the receiver's location may vary from the original document.

 If you are not the intended recipient please advise us and

delete all copies of this communication.



TAX ADVICE IN THIS COMMUNICATION (INCLUDING ATTACHMENTS) CANNOT

BE USED FOR THE PURPOSE OF AVOIDING PENALTIES UNDER THE INTERNAL

REVENUE CODE OR RECOMMENDING TO ANOTHER PARTY ANY MATTER

ADDRESSED HEREIN. THIS ADVICE MAY NOT BE FORWARDED (OTHER THAN

WITHIN THE TAXPAYER TO WHICH IT HAS BEEN SENT) WITHOUT OUR

WRITTEN CONSENT.
